DOC.brief_summary: This study focuses on blood inflammatory markers (pro-inflammatory cytokines, anti-inflammatory cytokines, monocytes costimulation molecules) in patients with resistant unipolar depression in comparison with non-resistant unipolar depressed patients.
DOC.criteria: group 1: Patients with resistant MDD (at least 2 failed treatments for the current episode) ,current treatment with IRS or IRSNA, group 2: patients with MDD remission after response to an antidepressant treatment. comorbid somatic or psychiatric disorders: chronic or acute inflammatory diseases, previous treatment with brain stimulation for the current episode, legal protection
